entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
